modName: Crown and Stones of Barenziah Texture Tweak
summary: Adds environment maps to the crown and stones of Barenziah and changes the textures a bit to make them look a little more appealing...
descriptionHtml:
Adds environment maps to the crown and stones of Barenziah and changes the textures a bit to make them look a little more appealing, I didn't really like the way the vanilla textures looked on the stones and the crown and didn't notice anything during a web search, so I tweaked them.. and made them shiny and metallic.. the way they should be.

This isn't meant to make the gems and crown look "amazing" with super duper HD textures or anything like that, it's just supposed to be a little nicer than what's already there. The pictures don't really show the differences that well, they are better seen in game.

Credit goes to Bethesda as all textures and meshes used are from the game it's self.
author: Mythos214

files.name: Stones and Crown of Barenziah Texture Tweak
